alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/... At 1011 PM EDT/911 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Callaway, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Nixon, Bayhead, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Bay Harbor, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Cairo, Brannonville, Millville and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
